law.text: For every fifty (50) men and fraction thereof employed underground, the operator of each mine shall keep on hand at the mine one (1) properly constructed stretcher, one (1) waterproof and one (1) woolen blanket, and all other necessary equipment required by the department.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 17, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 198, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 11. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 18. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739-24, 2739-32.
